text: Harold Adrian Linstone (June 15, 1924 - July 8, 2016) was a German-born American mathematician, consultant, futurist and University Professor Emeritus of Systems Science at Portland State University and a specialist in applied mathematics. He was born in Hamburg. Linstone was editor-in-chief of the professional journal "Technological Forecasting and Social Change", which he founded in 1969. Linstone died on July 8, 2016 in Portland, Oregon, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Harold A. Linstone on www.isss.org. * The Delphi Method: Techniques and Applications online.
